title: The Message - Discernment
description: In a world ravaged by a sun's destructive power; a land scorched and waterless, a group of children fight for knowledge and freedom from old traditions and beliefs.Their world is changing fast, and not for the better.Can they change too, and will they be in time?This first book - of aprox. 38,000 words - in 'The Message' trilogy, sets the scene with thought-provoking ideas and introduces characters that are brought to life in this dramatic fantasy.This is an original and imaginative read recommended for younger teenagers and tweens who are starting to discover the joys of exciting fantasy reading.
author: Paula McBride
